charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1), 841 (b)(1)(B), and 846 KNOWINGLY AND INTENTIONALLY CONSPIRE WITH OTHER PERSONS TO DISTRIBUTE AND TO POSSESS WITH THE INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE HEROIN, A SCHEDULE I DRUG CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE(1)
